sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
briefTitle: Actual Use Trial of Atorvastatin Calcium 10 mg
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Actual Use Trial In A Simulated Over-the-counter Environment Of Atorvastatin Calcium 10 Mg
summary: The purpose of this actual use study is to simulate the over the counter use of atorvastatin calcium 10 mg.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Complied With the Direction to Check Their Low-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C) Level
